name: snitch
author: Brent Glowinski (@BrenTicus)
description: Snitch on users for saying configured words. A *group* consists of a list of *targets* who are notified when *words* are said.
short: Snitch on users for saying configured words.
end_user_data_statement: Messageable interfaces for server members, channels, and roles may be stored in the bot config depending on cog configuration. No data is stored outside of bot config or log files.
